Text:
I am sick to death of 2 LIONS TEAM's inability to convey - IN ENGLISH (which seems to be the most prevalent language on TPB) - what they have and have not included on a DVD rip.

So the "Categorie" is "beeld" - what the fuck is that?

Despite the usually dependable audio and visual quality of 2 LION TEAM's rips, I will ALWAYS seek out another source which tells me what has been deleted from the DVD and just what the hell it is I can expect.  I want menus, I want the extras (even if it means spending â‚¬1.49 for a two-layer blank DVD), and I thank those contributors to TPB who provide them and explain content in one of the six languages I understand.

I agree with the previous post that all info should be in english. You might add dutch if you are dutch (like I am)

Other than that, 2Lions usually have great uploads, so thanxxx in advance for this one.
thanks for the movie...amd for those whiners about english...go and learn another language.
